content.body: I don't want "one invariant at a time" as an end in itself, I want test file **maintainability** (which has **comprehensibility** as a necessary but not sufficient condition) and **failure clarity**. test/built-ins/Iterator/zip/basic.js is weak on both, while test/built-ins/Iterator/zip/basic-iterator-*.js are good on the former but weak on the latter.
